name: InfinityCash
description: Infinity Cash is a classic token that you can trade as any other token. The difference is that we propose to ""stack for life"" 100 tokens to create a node and each node give you a reward of 5 tokens a day. The system to create the node is here : https://app.infinitycash.financial/ You get your rewards in tokens that you can reinvest or sell to take your profit. There is no sell or buy taxes. But when you create a 100 tokens nodes, 80 are going for the reward system, 18 in the liquidity pool and 2 in the marketing pool.
